text: these needs. 12.3 In addition to increasing the overall supply of new homes in the borough, there is also an acute need to ensure that all homes are of a good quality and meet the needs of their residents. This chapter includes policies that support the development of good quality homes that meet the needs of a wide variety of residents. It also supports the development of specialist housing that supports the needs of particular groups, such as older residents, those with special needs, and those experiencing homelessness. To meet this need, Policy HF2 imposes a requirement for development proposals to provide affordable housing, with rates varying depending on the nature of the development. BACK TO POLICIES
